thread.title: In Transit: Walkabout: Ash Closes Indonesia Airports; Tunisia Exodus
thread.title_full: In Transit: Walkabout: Ash Closes Indonesia Airports; Tunisia Exodus

author: THE NEW YORK TIMES
title: In Transit: Walkabout: Ash Closes Indonesia Airports; Tunisia Exodus
text: See More » Flight With Britain warning of another terrorist attack in Tunisia after last month’s attack at a waterfront hotel in Sousse, thousands of tourists have decided to leave the country. (Reuters) Excess Baggage A few websites and private jet companies are giving discounted rates to travelers for unused inventory, opening up a new market of luxury air travel at costs that were unheard of years ago. (MarketWatch) Analyze Looking to upgrade airline seats? Amassing miles was the traditional pathway to earning upgrades, but increased airline promotions to sell those seats have made things a lot trickier. (CNBC) Loading...
